name: nopCommerce
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: nopCommerce is an open source e-commerce solution that contains both a catalog frontend and an administration tool backend. nopCommerce is a fully customizable shopping cart. It's stable and highly usable.

matches.ghdb: "powered by nopCommerce" "You have no items in your shopping cart."

matches.text: <input type="submit" name="LoginForm$LoginButton" value="Log in" onclick="javascript:WebForm_DoPostBackWithOptions(new WebForm_PostBackOptions("LoginForm$LoginButton", "", true, "LoginForm", "", false, false))" id="LoginForm_LoginButton" class="adminButtonBlue" />
<input id="LoginForm_RememberMe" type="checkbox" name="LoginForm$RememberMe" checked="checked" /><label for="LoginForm_RememberMe">Remember me</label>
